no.kartverket.positionorientation

Class Transform.PointInPlaneObservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.kartverket.positionorientation.Transform.PointInPlaneObservation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transform.Observation
    Enclosing class:
    Transform

    public class Transform.PointInPlaneObservation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transform.Observation
    observation of a tango point that should lie in a plane described by world coordinates

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) float a
      Parameters for a plane in world coordinates defined by the equation a*x + b*y + c*z == d where the vector [a,b,c] should be normalized to unity
      (package private) float b
      Parameters for a plane in world coordinates defined by the equation a*x + b*y + c*z == d where the vector [a,b,c] should be normalized to unity
      (package private) float c
      Parameters for a plane in world coordinates defined by the equation a*x + b*y + c*z == d where the vector [a,b,c] should be normalized to unity
      (package private) float d
      Parameters for a plane in world coordinates defined by the equation a*x + b*y + c*z == d where the vector [a,b,c] should be normalized to unity
      (package private) float plane_sd
      a priori standard deviation of distance between plane and point
      (package private) float plane_v
      a posteriori estimate of residual (distance between plane and point)
      (package private) float plane_v_sd
      a posteriori estimate of standard deviation of residual
      (package private) float x_t
      x coordinate for tango position
      (package private) float y_t
      y coordinate for tango position
      (package private) float z_t
      z coordinate for tango position
